	<item>
		<title>Discipline is Freedom (for Software Developers)</title>
		<link>https://dustinewers.com/__trashed-3/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 25 Jun 2017 06:17:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[dustinewers]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://dustinewers.com/?p=358</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div data-contents="true">
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="app6s-0-0"></div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="1didj-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="1didj-0-0"><span data-offset-key="1didj-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="2ri2i-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="2ri2i-0-0"><span data-offset-key="2ri2i-0-0">What do ancient Greek philosophers, Navy Seals, and software developers have in common?</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="b95rd-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="b95rd-0-0"><span data-offset-key="b95rd-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="7tipf-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="7tipf-0-0"><span data-offset-key="7tipf-0-0">Discipline is freedom.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="2478o-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="2478o-0-0"><span data-offset-key="2478o-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="88ufj-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="88ufj-0-0"><span data-offset-key="88ufj-0-0">Discipline is often thought of as unpleasant. Boring, painful, and lame are all adjectives used to describe discipline. This is especially true for software developers. We are not known for our discipline. </span><span class="complexword"><span data-offset-key="88ufj-1-0">However</span></span><span data-offset-key="88ufj-2-0">, discipline can create freedom. Taking responsibility for your health, craft, and career can have dramatic benefits. </span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="88ufj-3-0">In this post, we're going to explore some of the ways that discipline can create freedom for software developers</span></span><span data-offset-key="88ufj-4-0">.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="329vn-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="329vn-0-0"><span data-offset-key="329vn-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="dl05s-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="dl05s-0-0"><span data-offset-key="dl05s-0-0">Discipline in Your Life </span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="3h725-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="3h725-0-0"><span data-offset-key="3h725-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="bpjja-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="bpjja-0-0"><span data-offset-key="bpjja-0-0">Part of being a great developer is being the best person you can be. There are three life categories where discipline can give you more freedom. These are health, wealth, and mental state.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="444pt-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="444pt-0-0"><span data-offset-key="444pt-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="94v88-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="94v88-0-0"><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="94v88-0-0">Maintaining your health </span></span><span class="adverb"><span data-offset-key="94v88-1-0">largely</span></span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="94v88-2-0"> consists of doing somewhat boring things on a regular basis</span></span><span data-offset-key="94v88-3-0">. Examples include getting enough sleep, exercising, eating healthy food, and brushing your teeth. </span><span class="veryhardreadability"><span data-offset-key="94v88-4-0">There are lots of books and courses that complicate these things, but that information is far less important than developing good habits</span></span><span data-offset-key="94v88-5-0">. A mediocre workout done daily is going to beat a perfect regimen that's only done a few times. The rewards are freedom from pain and the energy to do more. You also gain financial freedom because paying to fix health issues is expensive.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="5e6g2-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="5e6g2-0-0"><span data-offset-key="5e6g2-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="3aa47-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="3aa47-0-0"><span data-offset-key="3aa47-0-0">Finances are another area where discipline creates freedom. </span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="3aa47-1-0">Saving money and avoiding opulent purchases doesn't seem like much fun, but there are some serious upsides</span></span><span data-offset-key="3aa47-2-0">. The biggest upside is not being stuck in a job you hate. Living below your means allows you to quit and find a new job. Debt also reduces your options. It's hard to travel the world when you have two car payments and a mountain of credit card debt.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="sed6-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="sed6-0-0"><span data-offset-key="sed6-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="bhkg1-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="bhkg1-0-0"><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-0-0">Your mental state is another area that can </span><span class="passivevoice"><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-1-0">be improved</span></span><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-2-0"> through discipline. </span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-3-0">There are lots of practices your can adopt, such as stoicism, Buddhism, meditation, or </span></span><span class="adverb"><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-4-0">simply</span></span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-5-0"> spending more time outside</span></span><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-6-0">. For me, adopting stoicism was one of the best choices I've made. By adopting one or more of these practices, you can </span><span class="passivevoice"><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-7-0">be freed</span></span><span data-offset-key="bhkg1-8-0"> from your emotions. That doesn't mean that you feel nothing , but you gain a degree of control.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="9744b-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="9744b-0-0"><span data-offset-key="9744b-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="67rph-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="67rph-0-0"><span data-offset-key="67rph-0-0">Discipline in Your Craft</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="fa683-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="fa683-0-0"><span data-offset-key="fa683-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="d9jno-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="d9jno-0-0"><span data-offset-key="d9jno-0-0">Building software is a difficult craft that you can spend a lifetime mastering. It's also a craft where </span><span class="passivevoice"><span data-offset-key="d9jno-1-0">being undisciplined</span></span><span data-offset-key="d9jno-2-0"> and sloppy can make your life harder down the road. There many areas where </span><span class="passivevoice"><span data-offset-key="d9jno-3-0">being disciplined</span></span><span data-offset-key="d9jno-4-0"> can give you freedom.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="4ep1n-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="4ep1n-0-0"><span data-offset-key="4ep1n-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="1vgoa-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="1vgoa-0-0"><span data-offset-key="1vgoa-0-0">Here's a few examples:</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="6bql3-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="6bql3-0-0"><span data-offset-key="6bql3-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="af9on-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="af9on-0-0"><span class="veryhardreadability"><span data-offset-key="af9on-0-0">Adopting Test Driven Development (TDD) or being diligent about building automated testing means that you have the freedom to change your software without worrying that your clever refactoring blew up the application</span></span><span data-offset-key="af9on-1-0">.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="eolj7-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="eolj7-0-0"><span data-offset-key="eolj7-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="6gcjm-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="6gcjm-0-0"><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="6gcjm-0-0">Engaging in pair programming, code review, or generally seeking feedback reduces the time spent fixing bugs</span></span><span data-offset-key="6gcjm-1-0">.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="6gfee-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="6gfee-0-0"><span data-offset-key="6gfee-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="cs72o-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="cs72o-0-0"><span class="adverb"><span data-offset-key="cs72o-0-0">Regularly</span></span><span data-offset-key="cs72o-1-0"> communicating with your customers means less time spent reworking code.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="bsi8q-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="bsi8q-0-0"><span data-offset-key="bsi8q-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="8u8td-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="8u8td-0-0"><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="8u8td-0-0">By delivering constant value, you gain the freedom that comes with customers that trust you</span></span><span data-offset-key="8u8td-1-0">.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="eg80v-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="eg80v-0-0"><span data-offset-key="eg80v-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="d9j62-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="d9j62-0-0"><span data-offset-key="d9j62-0-0">Spending the extra time to write clean, clear code makes it easier to change your code later.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="829h5-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="829h5-0-0"><span data-offset-key="829h5-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="9bvuk-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="9bvuk-0-0"><span class="adverb"><span data-offset-key="9bvuk-0-0">Constantly</span></span><span data-offset-key="9bvuk-1-0"> learning about new techniques and technologies gives you more career options. </span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="9bvuk-2-0">This includes options within your current job and increased ability to leave that job</span></span><span data-offset-key="9bvuk-3-0">.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="2e8jm-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="2e8jm-0-0"><span data-offset-key="2e8jm-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="cjlk9-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="cjlk9-0-0"><span class="veryhardreadability"><span data-offset-key="cjlk9-0-0">Adopting a disciplined approach to software development reduces bugs, creates happier customers, and gives you more opportunities as a software developer</span></span><span data-offset-key="cjlk9-1-0">. It's more effort than throwing code against a wall and seeing what sticks, but it's worth the effort.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="f5o77-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="f5o77-0-0"><span data-offset-key="f5o77-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="fc5lk-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="fc5lk-0-0"><span data-offset-key="fc5lk-0-0">Discipline in Your Career </span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="ahdlk-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="ahdlk-0-0"><span data-offset-key="ahdlk-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="c7nq2-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="c7nq2-0-0"><span data-offset-key="c7nq2-0-0">Most software developers have haphazard approach to managing their career. They work from nine to five and go home and veg out on TV or video games. Development is </span><span class="qualifier"><span data-offset-key="c7nq2-1-0">just</span></span><span data-offset-key="c7nq2-2-0"> a job to these folks. Managing your own career takes hard work and discipline. </span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="c7nq2-3-0">The biggest payoff from managing your career is that being valuable gives you options</span></span><span data-offset-key="c7nq2-4-0">. If your services are in demand, you can pick what kind of job you like. Want a job that's going to push you hard and pay you a lot of money? </span><span class="adverb"><span data-offset-key="c7nq2-5-0">Easily</span></span><span data-offset-key="c7nq2-6-0"> done. Want a job where you work less, but still get paid well? There are plenty of those jobs as well. If you you manage your career, you can pick the kind of place you want to work at.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="2tufj-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="2tufj-0-0"><span data-offset-key="2tufj-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="96aj0-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="96aj0-0-0"><span data-offset-key="96aj0-0-0">There are several disciplines that you can adopt for managing your career. The first one is </span><span class="adverb"><span data-offset-key="96aj0-1-0">intentionally</span></span><span data-offset-key="96aj0-2-0"> picking the skills you want to learn. Spend time to figure out where the market is going and picking what skills you want to learn. </span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="96aj0-3-0">One way to do this is by creating a personal tech radar, where you list out technologies you're using and technologies you want to learn more about</span></span><span data-offset-key="96aj0-4-0">. This is a great quarterly exercise. </span><span class="adverb"><span data-offset-key="96aj0-5-0">Personally</span></span><span data-offset-key="96aj0-6-0">, I've </span><span class="passivevoice"><span data-offset-key="96aj0-7-0">been interested</span></span><span data-offset-key="96aj0-8-0"> in data analysis, so I've been working on those skills. Data Science is a hot field right now and I want to know more about it.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="brvn7-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="brvn7-0-0"><span data-offset-key="brvn7-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="6ofnm-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="6ofnm-0-0"><span data-offset-key="6ofnm-0-0">Another career discipline is marketing yourself. Marketing yourself involves consistent effort. One way to get started is to maintain a blog. </span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="6ofnm-1-0">Even if you don't become a millionaire blogger, you are creating a documented record of your skills</span></span><span data-offset-key="6ofnm-2-0">. Also, blogging is a great way to improve your communication skills. Another way to market yourself is by speaking at user groups and conferences. Speaking can be scary, but it's a great way to meet people and become known in your community. During my last job hunt, the person interviewing me saw a talk I did the previous month. My job search didn't last long.</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="ahd09-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="ahd09-0-0"><span data-offset-key="ahd09-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="4cne6-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="4cne6-0-0"><span data-offset-key="4cne6-0-0">TL;DR;</span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="45uu1-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="45uu1-0-0"><span data-offset-key="45uu1-0-0"></span></div>
</div>
<div class="" data-block="true" data-editor="diclp" data-offset-key="2884k-0-0">
<div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="2884k-0-0"><span data-offset-key="2884k-0-0">Discipline is a word that's rarely associated with freedom, but it should be. When you become more disciplined, you take control of your own life. You give yourself more options. </span><span class="hardreadability"><span data-offset-key="2884k-1-0">Adopting discipline in your life, craft, and career makes you healthier, wealthier, and happier</span></span><span data-offset-key="2884k-2-0">. Take a look at your own life. Find where you are lacking in discipline and work to improve those areas. You will thank yourself later.</span></div>
</div>
</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>

		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thrive_meta_postformat_video_youtube_hide_fullscreen]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thrive_meta_postformat_video_custom_url]]></wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[_thrive_meta_postformat_quote_text]]></wp:meta_key>
